{"step_by_step_thinking": "In the hierarchy of evidence, different types of studies provide different levels of evidence. Case control studies and cohort studies are observational studies, which are lower in the hierarchy. Systematic reviews and meta-analyses are at the top of the hierarchy. However, meta-analyses are considered to provide the highest level of evidence because they statistically combine the results of multiple studies, increasing the sample size and therefore the statistical power.", "answer_choice": "B. Meta-analysis"}
